pdhtm9QbgRN7cbyWuYWb5A.text: well all iv got to say is one of the best chipy in edinburgh . they are very welcoming to every one !! go hear you will not be disappointed . prices steep but you only pay for the best and they give you your moneys worth !!

oUA9VfMF6ffVopDLpZ8v7Q.text: The Gold Sea fish and chip shop on Ferry Road does exactly what it says on the tin, or at least on the photos. It's the first chippy I'd been in where the photos of the food look exactly like what you'll get. Not tarted up, not airbrushed, just plain old chippy food. But good chippy food. Their chips are excellent. Fish very tasty and not too greasy. They do oven cooked pizza too, and these are very good. (For the traditionalists out there they also do fried pizza). Kebabs also, though I've never tried these. Special fish n' chips and Ben and Jerry's phish food, the complete fish experience! Who needs more?

oKwILNknlqtiqcQQFU_rqA.text: All the same comments as the comment before but i have tried the kebabs and are as excelent as the rest of the food. My fave chippy! Great place for a quick snack or a fully fledged meal! Not exceedingly expensive either. Most prices range from 1 to 10 for a pizza or kebab.

UUjc8qJELA47i0Ysu2UhdA.text: Brilliant little chippy in the hart of ferry road. Does a variety of fish to kebabs and pizzas. all the food is good and reasonably priced. Open late and perfect on the way home from a night out or just as a meal. Staff are all nice and friendly

Dp1EQ5Is3T6jbV6tnYjL9A.text: woudl have to say fab the place is clean and you feel welcome at all time it is very presentable i have stayed in edinburgh all my life and i have been going to this chippy for ever and i would 100% recammend to all family and friends 100% food fab love it would travel a long way just to get a chippy from them would like to say to all the staff good job and keep it up denice edinburgh.x

ujtDFZQxrLxruZMht-VdHQ.text: super wee place and worth the detour if you don't live near it!
